performance_at_interview_what_to_improve:
Improve your understanding of teaching and learning. Curriculum requirements are in a state of constant change. We feel that you will benefit from increasing your awareness of contemporary educational issues, as well as secondary schools before being accepted onto a secondary initial teacher education programme. 

The Secondary programme is a demanding course and so requires significant academic aptitude and a high level of literacy. Take time and care over your written assessment tasks to make sure they show evidence that you will be able to meet the standard.

Stay passionate - this shone through!
